name: Kingna Lodge

reviews.title: Great B&B
reviews.text: A great B&B in this small town on the Route 62. Perfect location for walking to the local shops and restaurants. The lodge is beautifully decorated and furnished with antiques and has lovely wooden flooring. The lady who runs the place is really friendly and helpful in giving information about the local area. Rooms are very comfortable and well equipped.

description: The most Exclusive and Famous Lodge to stay over during your Visit to Montagu on R62, Cape Winelands South Africa. Kingna Lodge is a Luxury Guest House that provides a unique Colonial experience to the discerning Local or International Guest in an atmosphere of Relaxation, Privacy and Historical ambiance of the 1900's. Our Famous Guests Include former Presidents and Nobel Price winners, Nelson Mandela and F W de Klerk who appreciated the very high standards and exclusivity guaranteed at Kingna Lodge. Personal Service, attention to detail in every respect and a warm welcome are Hallmark features and we look forward to having you visit.
